page.title: 03RAF LIFE IN NESSCLIFFE
page.content: My Dad is in the RAF. I was born in Germany in l977 and since then I have moved six times. Ihave got two brothers they are called Ruari and Peter. Ruari is older than Peter. Ruari was born in Shropshire and Peter was born in Belfast.Living in quarters is all right but you have to be careful because the furniture is the Queen's and that makes it a bit worrying. I like moving because I can climb in the boxes. When I came to Nesscliffe I was not surprised we were going to live in Quarters again because wewere in Quarters before we moved. When I came to school I was a bit nervous as most people are when they come to a new school. I think this school is excellent because we make models and things and I have made some good friends but I have not got many where I live. CONTINUE
